oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de Visite of William Ferguson in Union officer uniform
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This soldier is identified as William Ferguson from Elizabethton, Carter County, Tennessee. No mention of a William Ferguson serving as an officer appears in the muster rolls. It is possible that he was a member of the 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt, USA as his image appeared in a collection of soldiers from that regiment.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ferguson, William
